edu.sdsmt.WornerTillma.App3

Class ForecastLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.sdsmt.WornerTillma.App3.ForecastLocation

  • public class ForecastLocation
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that controls getting the location information.

    Description:
    This class has methods for getting the location information, canceling the call to get location, writing to the parcel, and creating the parcel. All of these for the location information (nothing involving the forecast itself).

    Since:
    November 10, 2013
    Author:
    James Tillma and Teresa Worner
